GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.4.227
GSD.description:
drm/shmem-helper: Remove errant put in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.227 by commit 585a07b820059462e0c93b76c7de2cd946b26b40, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 2194a63a818db71065ebe09c8104f5f021ca4e7b. For more details please see the references link.
